title: Arc length using Euler's Method from a table

content.question: The table above gives selected values for a differentiable function f and its first derivative. Using a left Riemann sum with 3 subintervals of equal length, which of the following is an approximation of the length of the graph of f on the interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>[</mo> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> <mo>]</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> ?

topic.text: 8.13: (BC ONLY) The Arc Length of a Smooth, Planar Curve and Distance Traveled

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
